traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 27 (4d8 + 9 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 23 (4d6 + 9 damage) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.
